titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to require the use of dredged material in the construction of federally funded transportation projects.

bill.summary: 4/5/2000--Introduced. Amends Federal law to instruct the Secretary of Transportation to require the use of dredged material in the construction of federally funded transportation projects.
